sentences.en: A vacant lot or a bombsite can, to the amateur naturalist, produce an extraordinary variety of flora and fauna.
sentences.cn: 对于业余博物学者来说，在一片空地上或被炸后的废墟里可能发现种类繁多的植物群和动物群。

sentences.en: All plants [ flora ] need water and light.
sentences.cn: 一切 草木 都需要水和阳光.

sentences.en: Antibiotics produce a selective change in flora.
sentences.cn: 抗菌素引起菌丛的选择性变化.
失望在弗洛拉?曼胡德的胸中激荡.
弗洛拉·曼胡德正在沉思, 或者纳闷.

sentences.en: Flora Manhood had never taken part in a mystery.
sentences.cn: 弗洛拉·曼胡德从未介入过任何秘密勾当.

sentences.en: Flora Manhood had to shift her dead arm.
sentences.cn: 弗洛拉·曼胡德把发麻的双臂交换了一下位置.

sentences.en: Flora Manhood squealed , her eye on the Torte.
sentences.cn: 弗洛拉·曼胡德两眼盯住布丁,扬声尖叫.

sentences.en: Flora restored the heavy swivel chair to its upright position.
sentences.cn: 弗洛拉把那只笨重的转椅扶起来.

sentences.en: He had asked Flora for the Croydens'file.
sentences.cn: 他请弗洛拉取来了 克罗伊敦 夫妇的文件夹.

sentences.en: Honestly, Flora, this is getting ridiculous.
sentences.cn: 哎呀, 弗洛拉, 这事变得荒唐了.

sentences.en: It's only reasonable , as Flora Manhood saw it.
sentences.cn: 这正如弗洛拉曼胡德的看法,纯属理所当然.

sentences.en: On his desk was a printed form, which Flora had left.
sentences.cn: 在他的办公桌上, 弗洛拉留了一张印好的表格.

sentences.en: The subtropical island has a remarkably rich native flora.
sentences.cn: 这个亚热带岛屿有相当丰富的乡土植物种类.

sentences.en: Tourism is damaging the flora and fauna (= plants and animals ) of the island.
sentences.cn: 旅游业正在破坏该岛的动植物资源。

sentences.en: Viddre laughed, but grudgingly, at one of Flora's off jokes.
sentences.cn: 维迪听弗洛拉说出一句不伦不类的笑话,笑了, 但笑得很勉强.

words.tran_cn: 花的；植物的，植物群的；花似的

phrases.tran_cn: 正常菌丛；正常微生物区系

trans.tran_cn: （某地区或某时期的）植物群，植物志，植物区系，（大写）Flora:[罗神]花神弗洛拉，弗洛拉（女名）
trans.tran_en: all the plants that grow in a particular place or country
